Get started

Source: vignettes/get-started.Rmd
get-started.Rmd
library(grouptheory)

Include some data examples in your package

Occurrences 

Occurrences(c(2,3),rbind(c(1,2),c(2,3),c(2,3),c(7,8)))
#> [1] 2

# Example with your dataset in "inst/"
datafile=system.file("M64.RData",package="grouptheory")
load(datafile)
# Apply my function
Occurrences(c(1,2,4,8,16,32,7,1,1),M64)
#> [1] 1

Smallest 

Smallest(rbind(c(1,2),c(2,3),c(2,3),c(7,8)))
#> [1] 1 2

# Example with your dataset in "inst/"
datafile=system.file("M64.RData",package="grouptheory")
load(datafile)
# Apply my function
Smallest(M64)
#> [1]  1  2  4  8 16 32  7  1  1

FindRows 

FindRows(c(2,3,5),rbind(c(1,2,7),c(2,3,5),c(2,3,-10),c(7,8,5)))
#> [1] 2 3

# Example with your dataset in "inst/"
datafile=system.file("M64.RData",package="grouptheory")
load(datafile)
# Apply my function
FindRows(c(1,2,4,8,16,32,7,1,1),M64)
#> [1] 1

Divisors 

Divisors(12)
#> [1]  2  3  4  6 12

Inflate your package

Youâ€™re one inflate from paper to box. Build your package from this very Rmd using fusen::inflate()

  • Verify your "DESCRIPTION" file has been updated
  • Verify your function is in "R/" directory
  • Verify your test is in "tests/testthat/" directory
  • Verify this Rmd appears in "vignettes/" directory
